content:
ITEM NO.42                  COURT NO.13                SECTION IV-A
               S U P R E M E  C O U R T  O F  I N D I A
                       RECORD OF PROCEEDINGS
Petition(s) for Special Leave to Appeal (C) No.17400/2025
[Arising out of impugned final judgment and order dated 20-03-2025 
in WA No. 100058/2025 passed by the High Court of Karnataka Circuit
Bench at Dharwad]
KARNATAKA POWER TRANSMISSION CORPORATION LTD. (KPTCL) & ANR.
Petitioner(s)
                                VERSUS
DATTATREYA S GUDDALLI                              Respondent(s)
FOR ADMISSION 
 
WITH
SLP(C) No. 17470/2025 (IV-A)
FOR ADMISSION
IA No. 153136/2025 - EXEMPTION FROM FILING O.T.
 
Date : 07-07-2025 This petition was called on for hearing today.
CORAM : 
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE RAJESH BINDAL
         HON'BLE MR. JUSTICE R. MAHADEVAN
For Petitioner(s) : Mr. Vikram Hegde, AOR
                   Ms. Chinmayi Shrivastava, Adv.                 
For Respondent(s) : 
          UPON hearing the counsel the Court made the following
                             O R D E R
SLP (C) No.17400/2025
No case is made out for interference with the impugned order.
The special leave petition is, accordingly, dismissed.
Pending application(s), if any, shall also stand disposed of.
SLP(C) No. 17470/2025
On the request made by learned counsel for the petitioners, 
the matter is adjourned to 08.07.2025.
(KRITIKA TIWARI)                                  (SAPNA BANSAL)SENIOR PERSONAL ASSISTANT                       COURT MASTER (NSH)
